name: mobx-static-dom
description: Dynamic UIs using mobx and static DOM
author: Yassine Elouafi <yelouafi@gmail.com>

scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
